summary: CSS and Landing Page Layout Fix Testing Complete - Fixed AuthContext API URL issue, all landing page sections visible (no blank spaces), all 3 pricing cards visible, auth pages have consistent styling with navigation links

minor.issue: Rate limit (5 per minute) can cause test failures if tests run too quickly

integration_issues.issue: FIXED - AuthContext was missing /api prefix in API URL construction. Changed from using BACKEND_URL directly to appending /api when not present

issues: Pre-existing: Recharts console warnings about chart width/height -1 during initial render - cosmetic only

critical_code_review_comments: Fixed AuthContext.js API URL construction - was missing /api prefix causing 404 errors on auth endpoints
Landing page sections all render without blank spaces - Hero, Problem, How It Works, Features, Trust, Dashboard Preview, Pricing (3 cards), About, Contact, Footer all visible
Login page has all required elements: Back to Home link, ExportFlow logo (clickable), form fields with data-testid, Create account link, Forgot password link
Register page has all required elements: Back to Home link, ExportFlow logo (clickable), form fields with data-testid, Sign in link, password strength indicator
Dashboard loads correctly after login with sidebar navigation and consistent dark theme styling
Logout flow works correctly - redirects to landing page
seed_data_creation: Created new test user during registration flow testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: CSS consistency testing complete. AuthContext API URL bug was fixed (was missing /api prefix). All landing page sections render properly - no ScrollHero blank section issues. Login and Register pages have consistent dark theme with violet accents, 'Back to Home' links, and clickable logo navigation. Dashboard loads with sidebar, header, stat cards, charts, quick actions, and risk alerts.

tests: Playwright UI test - verified all sections visible
Landing_Page_Sections.details: All sections load without blank spaces: Navigation, Hero, Problem (3 cards), How It Works (Factory/Port/Bank journey), Features (3 cards), Trust (5 badges), Dashboard Preview, Pricing (3 cards: Starter/Professional/Enterprise with Most Popular badge), About (Our Mission/Who We Serve/Our Promise), Contact Form, Final CTA, Footer

Pricing_Cards.details: All 3 pricing cards visible: Starter (Free), Professional (â‚¹2,999/month with Most Popular badge), Enterprise (Custom)

tests: Playwright UI test + auth flow test
Login_Page.details: Login page has: Back to Home link, ExportFlow logo (clickable to /), Welcome Back heading, email/password inputs with data-testid, Sign In button, Create account link, Forgot password link, left panel with 4 feature cards, trust indicators

tests: Playwright UI test + registration flow test
Register_Page.details: Register page has: Back to Home link, ExportFlow logo (clickable), Get Started Free badge, Create Account heading, Full Name/Company/Email/Password inputs with data-testid, password strength indicator, 4 features list, Sign in link, trust indicators

tests: Playwright end-to-end test + backend API test
Auth_Flow_Registration.details: New user registration works - creates user and redirects to dashboard with 'Welcome to ExportFlow!' empty state

tests: Playwright end-to-end test + backend API test
Auth_Flow_Login.details: Login with test@moradabad.com works - redirects to dashboard showing user name and data

Dashboard_After_Login.details: Dashboard loads with: sidebar navigation (all nav items present), header with user info, 4 stat cards (Total Export Value, Outstanding Receivables, Incentives Earned, Pending GST Refund), Quick Actions bar (8 buttons), Export Trend chart, Payment Status chart, Performance Overview card, Risk Alerts card

Logout_Flow.details: Clicking Logout button redirects to landing page and clears auth state

api_endpoints_tested: POST /api/auth/login - Returns access_token (900s TTL), refresh_token (7 days), user object
POST /api/auth/register - Creates new user, returns tokens

fix_applied.issue: API URL was missing /api prefix causing 404 errors on auth endpoints
fix_applied.change: Modified API URL construction from 'const API = BACKEND_URL' to 'const API = BACKEND_URL.endsWith("/api") ? BACKEND_URL : `${BACKEND_URL}/api`'
